title: Systematic Congressional oversight obstruction campaigns - TTT Article 104
description:
Research systematic corruption pattern: Congressional oversight obstruction campaigns

SOURCE: Trump Tyranny Tracker Article 104
TITLE: Trump Tyranny Tracker: Day 129
URL: https://trumptyrannytracker.substack.com/p/trump-tyranny-tracker-day-129

CORRUPTION PATTERN ANALYSIS:
This research priority focuses on documenting the systematic nature of congressional oversight obstruction campaigns, 
moving beyond isolated incidents to reveal coordinated campaigns and institutional capture mechanisms.

KEY RESEARCH QUESTIONS:
- Which specific congressional subpoenas were systematically defied?
- How was executive privilege weaponized to obstruct investigations?
- What coordination existed to ensure unified obstruction strategies?
- Which documents were systematically withheld or destroyed?
- How were congressional staff intimidated or surveilled?
- What alternative information channels did Congress develop?

TIMELINE FOCUS:
- Document specific dates and coordination meetings
- Identify key actors and their systematic roles
- Map institutional capture progression
- Track resistance and countermeasures
- Connect to broader kleptocratic patterns

INDICATORS FROM SOURCE:
- Potential dates: may 5, 2025, june 3, 2025, 2025
- Key actors mentioned: To be researched
